attributes.action: To encourage Birmingham City Council to grant permission to Birmingham City FC to build and develop a site for a new stadium and sports village nr Small Heath.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Birmingham City council opposed the possibility to bid for the super casino in Birmingham, and lost out on the development jobs that would follow. We now urge the Government to use all it powers to encourage the council to grant BCFC the permission to redevelop the site, and partly fund new sports facilities for all the people of Birmingham.
